item.title: 8-bit Binary to Integer Calculator in C++
item.description: How to Convert an 8Bit Binary Number into an Integer This is a rather simple task to accomplish if you know some basic C++. Firstly, create a file called main.cpp. Then use the code shown below: #include <cstdio> int main(){ //a short is 8 bits, use 0b prefix notation for binary unsigned short a = 0b00001011; printf("%hu\n", a); return 0; } To compile and run this on Linux, do this:
